key.description: The unique identifier (UID) of the Permission

allow.description: A flag indicating if this permission is by default assigned to the role

permissions.description: A list of permissions that override the default permissions of the BusinessRole assigned to the staff member

updated_at.description: Date the BuinsessRole was last updated

description: An entity holding the list of permissions that override the default permissions of the BusinessRole assigned to the staff member. When empty role defaults are assigned to the user
